a6223a30c5aa1c.title: Native Son
a6223a30c5aa1c.author: Richard Wright
a6223a30c5aa1c.blurb: Right from the start, Bigger Thomas had been headed for jail. It could have been for assault or petty larceny; by chance, it was for murder and rape. Native Son tells the story of this young black man caught in a downward spiral after he kills a young white woman in a brief moment of panic.
